description.narrative: The SHSSP will support the development during 2014-2015 of senior high school (SHS) in the Philippines and the implementation of the SHS program during 2016-2019.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Effective SHS system established and implemented

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Proportion of SHS students in non-DepEd SHSs increases from zero (2014) to 40%, by 2019 (DLI)

description.narrative: Effective SHS system established and implemented

title.narrative: Cohort survival rate for secondary level (for grades 7-12) improves from 78.8% (for grades 7-10) in 2010 to 90% (for grades 7-12), by 2019 (90% for girls and 89% for boys)

description.narrative: Effective SHS system established and implemented

title.narrative: Learning outcomes in mathematics and science, as measured by MPS on national achievement test, improve from 46.8% (2013) to 50% in mathematics (MPS of at least 45% for males and for females) and from 41.3% (2013) to 45% in science (MPS of at least 40% for males and for females), by 2019 (DLI)

description.narrative: Effective SHS system established and implemented

title.narrative: Technical and vocational skills certification rate reaches at least 50% (at least 45% for males and 50% for females), by 2019 (DLI)

description.narrative: Effective SHS system established and implemented
